predicate.note: Frames file for 'eviscerate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry (the wimps), Framenet entry Removing.

roleset.name: remove the viscera (innards)

example.name: metaphorical
example.text: [The 1974 budget ``reform,'']-1 passed over President Nixon's veto, took away the presidential impoundment power, *trace*-1 thereby introducing monstrous CRs and eviscerating the presidential veto.

roleset.note: Unlike the canonical removing/emptying verbs, the thing removed cannot be mentioned.
